overview: Illustrator course offers a perfect blend of in-depth theoretical knowledge and strong practical skills via implementation of real-life Angular projects to give you a headstart and enable you to bag top Angular jobs in the industry.

enroll: 3 Real-time projects + tons of live practicals
70+ hrs of study material, quizzes & manuals
Lifetime access of LMS with videos & material
learn: Learn how to develop professional websites
Basics to advanced concepts of Angular
Projects with connectivity with back end like node/express.js
Master the advanced concepts like routing, pipes, i18N
Work on live Angular project to get hands-on experience

why.title: Angular ranked second in “most used technology” in the Stack Overflow Survey
Developed, maintained, managed and monitored by Google Developers
Average base pay of an Angular Developers is more than INR 460,000 per year in India
The world’s most valuable resource is Big Data, no longer oil.
Rapid application development, Plays a role of front end in MEAN stack development

prerequisite.que: What to do before you begin your Illustrator online training?
prerequisite.suggest: Although if you’d like, you can brush up on your skills with our complementary HTML material right in your LMS.

curriculum.title: Diving into Angular
content: Why Angular is most popular web development framework?

curriculum.title: Getting Ready to Learn Angular
content: Upgrading the existing Angular version to the latest version

curriculum.title: Angular Directives
content:
Types of Directives
  • Components
  • Attribute Directives
  • Structural Directives
    • ngFor
    • ngIf
  • ngSwitchcase
  • ngClass and ngStyle

curriculum.title: Working on Services
content: Why and what is a Service

curriculum.title: Demystifying HttpObservables
content: Communicating with server via observable in Angular

curriculum.title: Working with Forms and Reactive Forms
content:
Forms
  • Types of forms
  • Building blocks
  • Creating Forms
  • Data flow mechanism

Reactive Forms
  • Building Reactive Form
  • Update elements
  • Nested FormGroup
  • setValue and setPatch
  • Working with FormBuilder
  • Playing with Dynamic Form
Communicating with server via observable in Angular

curriculum.title: Template Driven Forms
content: Playing with two-way data binding using ngModel

curriculum.title: Working with i18N
content: Step by step setup of i18N support

curriculum.title: Demystifying HttpObservables
content: How to test angular components and services

curriculum.title: Real Life Angular Projects
content: Live Angular projects based on real industry scenarios. Work on real life problems and handle become industry ready

features.title: Lifetime access to course with support
Discussion forum for queries and interaction

forWho.que: Is this Illustrator Course for you?
forWho.ans:
Web development is the truth of today and Angular proves to be one of the most popular open-source web application frameworks. So while anyone can benefit from a career in it, here are the kind of professionals who go for this Angular course:
  • Software developers, engineers
  • Sr/Jr Frontend developers
  • System Architect
  • UI/Ux Designers
  • Any graduate focusing to build a career in Angular

companies.title: Companies you can expect when you get Angular-certified with us

faq.que: How will I perform the Angular practicals at home?
faq.ans: For Angular practice, manual and video for Angular installation are available in LMS and you need to install it on your system at home.

faq.que: How long will the Angular course recordings be available?
faq.ans: All the Angular training sessions along with the complete Angular study material, POCs, and Angular projects will be available for lifetime.

faq.que: What things do I need to learn Angular through this course?
faq.ans: To attend this online Angular training, you just need a laptop or a PC with a minimum 4GB RAM. Nothing else is required to learn it.

faq.que: How do I clear my Angular related doubts?
faq.ans: You can post your queries on the discussion forum. Our support team will be happy to assist you.

faq.que: What are the system specifications required to learn Angular?
faq.ans: The recommendation is a minimum of an i3 processor, a 20 GB disk, and a 4 GB RAM for installing Angular.

faq.que: How will this Angular course help me in getting a job?
faq.ans: Our Angular training includes multiple workshops, POCs, and projects. These will vigorously prepare you for Angular interviews so you can be confident in your work from day one. These things will help you get your dream Angular job in the industry.

faq.que: What will the end result be of this online Angular training course?
faq.ans: When you finish this course, you will be equipped with practical skills and theoretical knowledge the industry looks for. You will bloom into a certified Angular professional who is ready to take on Angular Projects in top organizations.

faq.que: Where do all the students come from?
faq.ans: DataFlair has a blend of students from across the globe. Apart from India, we provide training in the US, the UK, Singapore, Canada, UAE, France, Brazil, Ireland, Indonesia, Japan, Sri Lanka, and many others covering the globe.

faq.que: Is this Angular training classroom-based or online?
faq.ans: This training is completely online and self-paced.

faq.que: Will you be providing Angular certificate after the training?
faq.ans: Yes, you will be provided with an industry-recognizable certificate declaring your proficiency with Angular. At the end of this Angular course, you will work on real-time Angular projects. Once you have successfully made it through the projects, you will be awarded DataFlair Angular certificate.

faq.que: How do I get in touch with you for further queries?
faq.ans: You are  to contact us by placing a call at +91-8451097879 or by dropping a mail to info@data-flair.training

Angular is the latest and the most demanding technology with a continuously increasing demand in the Indian market and abroad. It is changing the world. So learn Angular to start a career in trending technologies.

faq.que: What type of Angular projects will I be doing during the training?
faq.ans: You will be doing Angular real-life projects in different domains like retail, banking, and finance.
This Angular course from DataFlair is 100% job-oriented and will prepare you completely for interviews from Angular job perspective.

faq.que: Can I attend a demo session before enrolling for this Angular course?
faq.ans: Yes, you can attend the Angular demo class recording on this course page itself to understand the quality of training we provide. This is what creates the difference between DataFlair and other online Angular training providers.

faq.que: Can you guide me about the career aspects of Angular developers?
faq.ans:
Angular is the technology that will open many doors for you. With Angular, you can be a:
  • Front End Developer
  • Software Developer
  • Software Engineer
  • Software architect
